TopicTitle: Game freezes and crashes when large ship explodes & UI overlap

Articles.Content:
My ship exploded on launch (literally, every part seemed to separate) and then after pressing revert to VAB my game froze and crashed (the music was still playing, but it didn't load for minutes)

My specs are:
CPU: Intel i5-11600K @ 3.90 GHz
GPU: EVGA RTX 3060 XC 12GB
RAM: 32GB @ 3600MHz

My game is installed on an M.2 drive

v0.1.1.0

My ship was pretty large, but this is the first freeze/crash after my ship ran into 'issues'
